website_summaries.verdict: The wire-free Axgio AH-T1 earphones feature surprisingly powerful Bluetooth audio for the price, held back slightly by a clunky design.
pros: Powerful, bass-forward audio with crisp, clear highs and no distortion
cons: Control panel is easy to misfire

customer_reviews.title: Earphones to avoid
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for true wireless earphones then these are not the option to go with. The sound quality is pretty poor, the setup is a pain, they go out of sync with each other very often and to top that all off if you wear them for more than a few minutes your ears will likely start hurting. If you are looking for true wireless earphones definitely avoid these.
customer_reviews.author: Adam O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase. Great value and one of the best 'true wireless' headphones at the moment!
customer_reviews.text: Decent sounding headphones for the price! Easy to pair and get going straight away. Decent range and haven't heard any cut offs. I bought some memory foam earbuds to replace the standard silicon ones that come with it for a little more comfortable fit, little better bass and slight better noise cancellation from the outside world. They are a little uncomfortable after a couple of hours in your ear. Battery life seems fairly decent, and I did forget to turn them off too, a lot better than some of the others on the market. Solid purchase, after looking around for 'true wireless' headphones, I'd say these are worth a buy for the time being.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic item have two sets of these can use just ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic item have two sets of these can use just the one head phone-or both If both in in ear it gose to Stereo choose this style as I have small ear hole and ear bud type dose not stay in my ears but these are Very comfortable but not everybody will like these it’s down to personal choice
customer_reviews.author: Elaine mason

customer_reviews.title: Oh wow DAMN!!!
customer_reviews.text: I own so many Bluetooth headphones and headsets and when I watched the unbox therapy video I just thought this can't be real...I just got mine today and I do not write reviews much but I just had to for these...they are just amazing...!!! Anyone that wants to invest in a great pair for luxury or exercise get these now!!!! Like they are so so good am lost for words and they just work!!! The BASS IS DEEEPPPP... work with your equaliser and blow your mind!!!
customer_reviews.author: Muchi

customer_reviews.title: They were great for about two weeks then they stopped connecting to ...
customer_reviews.text: They were great for about two weeks then they stopped connecting to each other. The 'left' bud then stopped working completely. Tried to contact seller - no response. do yourselves a favour - but better. Cheap doesn't mean good
customer_reviews.author: wowcole

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Great idea and brilliant for when your at the gym no wires to get in the way Only criticism is that they can be hard to pair at times . also the battery always runs out on one before the other bit still last more then enough time anyways. Decent sound and loudness so great value for price
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Stylianou

customer_reviews.title: Great. Comfortable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great. Comfortable and easy to use. Sometimes have minor connectivity issues, but nothing really. Would 100% recommend. Batteries last a few hours easy
customer_reviews.author: Oscar S.

customer_reviews.title: You have to buy these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Best earphones I've ever bought and I've bought a lot! Easy to connect, super easy to use and they sound great. Wear mine to the gym and had never had a problem using them, always stay nice secure in place. A must buy for anyone wanting a cable free life!
customer_reviews.author: Matt J

customer_reviews.title: ... connection dose stutter some times and they don't fit brilliantly in my ears but they are very portable and ...
customer_reviews.text: these are grate for a work out but I have found that the connection dose stutter some times and they don't fit brilliantly in my ears but they are very portable and work well
customer_reviews.author: sam noble

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Fits very good in your ear, the volume is great and the low end is so sick :-) You gonna love this headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Gonçalo Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth no longer works
customer_reviews.text: Bought in July 2017, they were great. Now Bluetooth connectivity no longer works, can’t find on my list when I look for Bluetooth devices
customer_reviews.author: Josh B

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!!
customer_reviews.text: Very bad product! If i could i would give it zero star! My son only had it for less than 6 months and it has already broken, so I would advise not to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: monowara zaigirdar

customer_reviews.title: Great product - I've been waiting for my Phazons and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product - I've been waiting for my Phazons and bought these in the mean time. Easy set up, little or no latency between the two earbuds, great sound quality. I wasn't expecting much at this px point and these more than exceeded expectations. Worth the money. Cheers
customer_reviews.author: BostonExPat

customer_reviews.title: my opinion on axigo
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, fully wireless, very loud, clear, good bass, short charging time, long usage time, convenient, comfortable, no problems and good mic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good except when watching video
customer_reviews.text: Good earphones only problem is when watching video there's a delay for the sound so really only useful as a secondary pair of earphones when listening to music
customer_reviews.author: JACK DOHERTY

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pair with phone and excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pair with phone and excellent sound. Value for money for a quality product. Great to be totally wire free!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Delivered promptly well packed very comfy when wearing great sound For me this is well worth the money

customer_reviews.title: except the mic on those are not good, but for music listening and comfort real
customer_reviews.text: all ok Works finne,came quckly,except the mic on those are not good,but for music listening and comfort real fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too tight and painful to wear
customer_reviews.text: It is too tight and painful to wear .The fit is not as well as i had hoped for. Sound can get very loud and i felt like taking them off after an hour of listening. Not the comfy ones that you could wear for hours - So the battery life isn't a huge concern at this stage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Just got my iphone 7 which is designed to use wireless earphones so thought i would try some. Guided by You Tube tutorial "Does It Suck?". These earphones are great. Not too expensive (especially compared with the Apple ones).
customer_reviews.author: Gloops

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them! Early Christmas present, can't fault them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for listening to music and running
customer_reviews.text: Good for listening to music, Great to don't have a cable hanging around. You can run and wear this headphones and listen to Your great music.
customer_reviews.author: Damian

product_meta.title: AXGIO AH-T1 True Wireless Earbuds,Waterproof Sport Earphones,Bluetooth 4.2 Bass-Enhanced Stereo In-Ear Headphones with Mic for iPhone,Samsung,Android Cellphones
product_meta.description:
AXGIO AH-T1 Earbuds, with Truly Wireless Technology, features independent control for each earbud. So they can be used as two individual mono earbuds for 2 people or as a pair of stereo earphones for yourself.

Totally Cable Free
No more tangled cables, no more bounded. Enjoy full wireless freedom with the AXGIO headsets. Pure freedom is for your ears when you are at the gym, on the track, at the pool, or wherever your passion drives you. Wearing the AXGIO AH-T1 earbuds with nothing holds you back.

Mono and Stereo Optional
A pair of wireless earbuds adapt to your needs perfectly with two independent controls. You may not only use a single bud to keep an ear open to the traffic and also use them as a regular pair to isolate ambient noises around you.

Enhanced Bluetooth 4.2
Powered by advanced BT 4.2 technology, the Bluetooth earbuds add an extra built-in antenna to ensure a faster and more efficient transmission for stream music and calls.
Bluetooth 4.2 is Backward compatibility, you can connect Axgio AH-T1 Earbuds with all Bluetooth devices

Snug Fitting Design
Ergonomic design along with multiple ear cushions, the earbuds fit snugly in your ears in a most comfortable way. They’re designed to stay put during your entire running and gym workout.

Function:
Support all functions, volumes adjust, next/previous songs, pause/play, answer/end/reject call and voice command (such as Siri)

Specification:
Chip: CSR64210
Bluetooth Version: 4.2
Frequency Response: 200Hz-10Khz
Battery Capacity: 95mAh*2
Charging Time: about 1-2 hr
Charging Port: USB cable
Talk & Music Time: 6 hours(at 50% volumes)
Weight: 22.6g
Package:
1* Headphones
3* Ear Tips
1* Micro USB Charging Cable
1* Carrying Case

Attention:IPX4 waterproof，withstand splashing water from any direction, not means for heavy rain or sweat , diving underwater.
feature_bullets: [Wireless Earphone Twins]: AXGIO AH-T1 consists of two headphones, either one can be used independently or paired with another. You can use it as a pair for stereo audio, or as two individuals for mono audio

[Real Cordless Innovation]: With AXGIO AH-T1(True Wireless Stereo) technology, now you can say goodbye to tangling and disturbing of cords, immersing in free-spirited sports, such as jogging, running, cycling, hiking and gym workouts, or sharing music with close friends beyond cable length limitation

[Superior Sound Quality]: Built in professional φ14 mm composite film speaker, AXGIO AH-T1 earphones provide crystal clear sound with enhanced bass during music listening. Noise/Echo Cancellation technology brings better calling experience to you

[Comfortable & Secure Fit]: Ergonomic design and flexible silicone ear hooks naturally fit the contours of your ears, without concerning about falling out when exercising, meanwhile Oblique In-Ear design and interchangeable earbud tips (S/M/L) fit different ear sizes to stay put and comfortable hold

[Smart Connectivity & Longer Battery Life & Sweat-proof]: Advanced Bluetooth 4.2 technology enables smart auto connectivity and 250% faster, securer, and more reliable over-the-air data transmission; With built-in 95mah battery in each earbud, it gives you up to 6 hours talking or music playing time (at 50% volume); With IPX4 waterproof technology, the earbuds can withstand sweat and splashing water from any direction
